thread.title: US to issue 'condolence payments' to families of victims of Afghan hospital airstrike
thread.title_full: US to issue 'condolence payments' to families of victims of Afghan hospital airstrike - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: US to issue 'condolence payments' to families of victims of Afghan hospital airstrike
text: The Pentagon said on Saturday it would issue “condolence payments” to those injured in the U.S. airstrike that destroyed a hospital and killed at least 22 people in the northern Afghan city of Kunduz last week. ...
